title: Rand Paul Hopes To Court Young, Libertarian Vote In Presidential Bid
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish talks to NPR's Domenico Montanaro about where Rand Paul fits in the Republican field of contenders for president in 2016 and the issues that bolster his appeal to young people.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
